message.content:
1. Let's say your sister is named X. When you were 6 years old, your sister was half your age, so she was (1/2)*6 = 3 years old.
2. Now you are 80 years old. Since your sister has aged at the same rate as you, she must now be 80 - 3 = 77 years old.

Therefore, your sister is currently 77 years old.
